panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

matcher.options: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: hosted-runners Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_shard_apdex:ratio_1h{type="hosted-runners"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_apdex:ratio_5m{type="hosted-runners"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_apdex:ratio_1h{type="hosted-runners"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_apdex:ratio_30m{type="hosted-runners"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_apdex:ratio_6h{type="hosted-runners"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

matcher.options: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: hosted-runners Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_1h{type="hosted-runners"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_5m{type="hosted-runners"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_1h{type="hosted-runners"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_30m{type="hosted-runners"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_6h{type="hosted-runners"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="hosted-runners"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: hosted-runners Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.
panels.title: Saturation

panels.content:
This is global overview of all hosted runners.

For more information check the hosted runner dashboard in the runner project.
panels.title: Notes

panels.content:
The Grafana Hosted Runner Manager Dashboard for dedicated environments provides a real-time view of GitLab runners' performance.

It tracks key metrics like job execution times, runner utilization, system health, and alerts for issues such as downtime
or job failures. This dashboard helps optimize runner performance and resource management in dedicated setups, ensuring efficient CI/CD workflows.
panels.title: Notes
Taskscaler max use count per instance

panels.content:
This SLI monitors job polling operations from runners (not only hosted runners), via Workhorse's /api/v4/jobs/request route.

5xx responses are considered to be errors, and could indicate postgres timeouts (after 15s) on the main query used in assigning jobs to runners.
panels.title: Notes
